title: Microwave Anatomy | UVDOSTH-Micro
desc: We are discussing the basic anatomy of a Microwave Body and how we can upcycle / re-purpose a microwave by building a UVDOSTH Micro using a old microwave body.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.
other_info1: Be a part of creating Sustainable Technology Ecosystems.
other_info3: An initiative by AspireFactory in partnership with AIC RAISE, Startup Incubation Centre Focusing on United Nation’s Sustainable Development Goals.
other_info4: Supported by  Atal Innovation Mission, NITI Aayog, Government of India.

title: Microwave Assembly Part 1 | UVDOSTH-Micro
desc: We show how to connect the mains cord and fix the UVC lamp in the re-purposed microwave body.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.
other_info1: Be a part of creating Sustainable Technology Ecosystems.

title: Microwave Assembly Part 2 | UVDOSTH-Micro
desc: We show how to make the connection with the cut off switch and the lamp. This is the key safety measure to follow when building any UVC chamber. this will make the chamber safe to use since the UV lamp would be switched off on opening the door.
buy: To buy your UV DOSTH or to order the components to build one please visit our website.

title: Microwave Demo | UV DOSTH-Micro
desc: The final connection to complete the circuit. We are demonstrating on how the UV DOSTH Micro will work.
